text: The Lady in Question is a 1940 American romantic comedy-drama movie directed by Charles Vidor and starring Glenn Ford, Rita Hayworth, Brian Aherne, Irene Rich, George Coulouris, Lloyd Corrigan, Evelyn Keyes, Edward Norris. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1940 romantic comedy movies Category:1940 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies directed by Charles Vidor
title: The Lady in Question
